list1.title: Tower Orientation
items: Tower Leg 1 is referenced as tower leg clockwise from north.
Anchor A1 is referenced as anchor clockwise from north.
Tower face A is referenced as face clockwise from north.
For a guyed tower with only one anchor on each azimuth, B anchors are omitted.

list2.title: Tower Alignment and Twist
items: Deflections in X and Y directions are determined from locations behind Anchors 1B, 2B, and 3B. (+ to right, - to left)
Positive tower twist is counter clockwise.
